DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-107
DataSourceDefinition.Expression: SELECT FACT.PAIS, FACT.VAL_NOMB_PERI, EMPRE.EMPRESA, FACT.COD_REGI, FACT.DES_REGI, FACT.COD_ZONA, FACT.DES_ZONA, FACT.GERENTE_ZONA, FACT.FACTURADO, RECLAMOS.OPERACIONES_ANULADAS, DECODE(FACT.FACTURADO,0,0,(OPERACIONES_ANULADAS/FACT.FACTURADO)*100) POR_ANULACIONES, DECODE(FACT.UNID_ATEN,0,0,(OPERACIONES_ANULADAS/SUM(FACT.UNID_ATEN) OVER (PARTITION BY FACT.VAL_NOMB_PERI, FACT.COD_REGI))*100) POR_PARTICIPACION, FACT.TOTAL FROM ( SELECT PER.OID_PERI, REG.OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT OP.OID_OPER),0) AS OPERACIONES_ANULADAS FROM REC_CABEC_RECLA CAB_REC, REC_OPERA_RECLA OP_REC, REC_OPERA OP, REC_TIPOS_OPERA T_OP, ZON_REGIO REG, ZON_ZONA ZONA, ZON_SECCI SEC, ZON_TERRI_ADMIN ZTA, CRA_PERIO PER, ( SELECT FEC_INIC FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = %value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE% )PER_INI, ( SELECT FEC_FINA FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = DECODE(%value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%,-1,%value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE%,%value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%) )PER_FIN WHERE CAB_REC.OID_CABE_RECL = OP_REC.CARE_OID_CABE_RECL AND CAB_REC.OID_CABE_RECL = OP_REC.CARE_OID_CABE_RECL AND OP_REC.TIOP_OID_TIPO_OPER = T_OP.OID_TIPO_OPER AND T_OP.ROPE_OID_OPER = OP.OID_OPER AND CAB_REC.PERD_OID_PERI_RECL = PER.OID_PERI AND PER_INI.FEC_INIC <= PER.FEC_INIC AND PER_FIN.FEC_FINA >= PER.FEC_FINA AND CAB_REC.PAIS_OID_PAIS = %value_PAISVALUE% AND PER.PAIS_OID_PAIS = CAB_REC.PAIS_OID_PAIS AND PER.MARC_OID_MARC = %value_MARCAVALUE% AND PER.CANA_OID_CANA = %value_CANALVALUE% AND REG.PAIS_OID_PAIS = PER.PAIS_OID_PAIS AND REG.OID_REGI = ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI AND ZONA.OID_ZONA = SEC.ZZON_OID_ZONA AND SEC.OID_SECC = ZTA.ZSCC_OID_SECC AND CAB_REC.ZTAD_OID_TERR_ADMI = ZTA.OID_TERR_ADMI %start_REGIONVALUES% AND REG.OID_REGI IN (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND ZONA.OID_ZONA IN (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES% AND OP.OID_OPER = %value_OPERACIONVALUE% GROUP BY PER.OID_PERI, REG.OID_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA ) RECLAMOS, ( SELECT GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N PAIS, REG.OID_REGI, REG.COD_REGI, REG.DES_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, ZONA.COD_ZONA, ZONA.DES_ZONA, CLI.VAL_APE1||' '||CLI.VAL_APE2||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM1||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM2 GERENTE_ZONA, PER.OID_PERI, PER.VAL_NOMB_PERI, COUNT(DISTINCT FAC.OID_CABE) FACTURADO, NVL(SUM(FAC.VAL_TOTA_PAGA_DOCU),0) AS TOTAL, SUM(FAC_LIN.NUM_UNID_ATEN) UNID_ATEN FROM FAC_DOCUM_CONTA_CABEC FAC, FAC_DOCUM_CONTA_LINEA FAC_LIN, ZON_REGIO REG, ZON_ZONA ZONA, CRA_PERIO PER, MAE_CLIEN CLI, ( SELECT FEC_INIC FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = %value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE% )PER_INI, ( SELECT FEC_FINA FROM CRA_PERIO WHERE OID_PERI = DECODE(%value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%,-1,%value_PERIODOINICIALVALUE%,%value_PERIODOFINALVALUE%) )PER_FIN, ( SELECT GEN.VAL_OID, GEN.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC GEN WHERE GEN.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_PAIS' AND GEN.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) GEN_PAIS WHERE FAC.OID_CABE = FAC_LIN.DCCA_OID_CABE AND FAC.ZORG_OID_REGI = REG.OID_REGI AND FAC.ZZON_OID_ZONA = ZONA.OID_ZONA AND ZONA.ZORG_OID_REGI = REG.OID_REGI AND REG.PAIS_OID_PAIS = %value_PAISVALUE% AND PER_INI.FEC_INIC = PER.FEC_INIC AND PER_FIN.FEC_FINA >= PER.FEC_FINA AND FAC.PERD_OID_PERI = PER.OID_PERI AND PER.PAIS_OID_PAIS = REG.PAIS_OID_PAIS AND GEN_PAIS.VAL_OID(+) = PER.PAIS_OID_PAIS AND PER.MARC_OID_MARC = %value_MARCAVALUE% AND PER.CANA_OID_CANA = %value_CANALVALUE% AND ZONA.CLIE_OID_CLIE = CLI.OID_CLIE(+) %start_REGIONVALUES% AND REG.OID_REGI IN (%value_REGIONVALUES%) %end_REGIONVALUES% %start_ZONAVALUES% AND ZONA.OID_ZONA IN (%value_ZONAVALUES%) %end_ZONAVALUES% GROUP BY GEN_PAIS.VAL_I18N, REG.OID_REGI, REG.COD_REGI, REG.DES_REGI, ZONA.OID_ZONA, ZONA.COD_ZONA, ZONA.DES_ZONA, CLI.VAL_APE1||' '||CLI.VAL_APE2||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM1||' '||CLI.VAL_NOM2, PER.VAL_NOMB_PERI, PER.OID_PERI ) FACT, ( SELECT SOC.VAL_DENO EMPRESA FROM PRINCIPALS PRI, PROPERTYVALUES PRO, SEG_SOCIE SOC WHERE PRI.NAME = %value_ZONEUSERVALUE% AND PRO.IDPROPERTY = 48 AND PRO.IDPRINCIPAL = PRI.IDPRINCIPAL AND PRO.STRINGVALUE = SOC.OID_SOCI ) EMPRE WHERE RECLAMOS.OID_PERI(+) = FACT.OID_PERI AND RECLAMOS.OID_REGI(+) = FACT.OID_REGI AND RECLAMOS.OID_ZONA(+) = FACT.OID_ZONA
